hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The status of COVID-19 is ever changing. ACGC School District will be updating this site regularly as events and information become available.

h3.div: ACGC Public Schools COVID-19 Distance Learning Plan: Click Here
ACGC Schools Food Service Request Form: Click here

div.p: The COVID-19 School Closure has left families concerned about providing a variety of resources. To help out, ACGC Schools will be offering FREE meals for children ages 18 and younger during the school closure period.

Breakfast/Lunch pick up will be available from 7:30 am to 8:30 am on weekdays during regularly scheduled school days (Tuesday-Friday) at the following locations:
• ACGC Elementary in Atwater - Main Entrance
• ACGC Jr/Sr High in Grove City - South Entrance by big parking lot
• Cosmos Learning Center in Cosmos - Main Entrance
Families who lack transportation or with medically fragile children can request that food be delivered to their residence. Please contact Kathryn at haasek@acgcfalcons.org or (320) 244-4637.
For everyone's safety, please be sure to maintain social distancing of at least 6 feet during meal pick up.
